verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and tempting <S%G3985><s%> desired <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that he would show <S%G1925><s%> them <S%G846><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> When it is <S%G1096><s%> evening, <S%G3798><s%> ye say, <S%G3004><s%> It will be fair weather: <S%G2105><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sky <S%G3772><s%> is red. <S%G4449><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> It will be foul weather <S%G5494><s%> today: <S%G4594><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sky <S%G3772><s%> is red <S%G4449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lowering. <S%G4768><s%> O ye hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> ye can <S%G1097><s%> discern <S%G1252><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sky; <S%G3772><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> ye not <S%G3756><s%> discern the <S%G3588><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> times? <S%G2540><s%>

A wicked <S%G4190><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seeketh after <S%G1934><s%> a sign; <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there shall no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> unto it, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> Jonah. <S%G2495><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he left <S%G2641><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and departed. <S%G565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> were come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other side, <S%G4008><s%> they had forgotten <S%G1950><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Take heed <S%G3708><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> reasoned <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> It is because <S%G3754><s%> we have taken <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

Which when <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> perceived, <S%G1097><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> O ye of little faith, <S%G3640><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> reason <S%G1260><s%> ye among <S%G1722><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> ye have brought <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread? <S%G740><s%>

Do ye not yet <S%G3768><s%> understand, <S%G3539><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> remember <S%G3421><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> five thousand, <S%G4000><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> ye took up? <S%G2983><s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> four thousand, <S%G5070><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> ye took up? <S%G2983><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> is it that ye do not <S%G3756><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I spake <S%G2036><s%> it not <S%G3756><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> that ye should beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Sadducees? <S%G4523><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> understood <S%G4920><s%> they how <S%G3754><s%> that he bade <S%G2036><s%> them not <S%G3756><s%> beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> of bread, <S%G740><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> coasts <S%G3313><s%> of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> Philippi, <S%G5376><s%> he asked <S%G2065><s%> his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> do men <S%G444><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that I <S%G3165><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> am? <S%G1511><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Some <S%G3588><s%> say <S%G3303><s%> that thou art John <S%G2491><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Baptist: <S%G910><s%> <S%G1161><s%> some, <S%G243><s%> Elijah; <S%G2243><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> others, <S%G2087><s%> Jeremiah, <S%G2408><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> that I <S%G3165><s%> am? <S%G1511><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou, Simon <S%G4613><s%> Bar-jona: <S%G920><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> hath not <S%G3756><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> it unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> but <S%G235><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> I say also <S%G2504><s%> <S%G3004><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> rock <S%G4073><s%> I will build <S%G3618><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> church; <S%G1577><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the gates <S%G4439><s%> of hell <S%G86><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> prevail against <S%G2729><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> keys <S%G2807><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou shalt bind <S%G1210><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> be bound <S%G1210><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou shalt loose <S%G3089><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> loosed <S%G3089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> charged <S%G1291><s%> he his <S%G848><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G2036><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> that <S%G3752><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2076><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

From <S%G575><s%> that time forth <S%G5119><s%> began <S%G756><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to show <S%G1166><s%> unto his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> how that <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> go <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be killed, <S%G615><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be raised again <S%G1453><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

Then <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Be it far <S%G2436><s%> from thee, <S%G4671><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> unto thee. <S%G4671><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> turned, <S%G4762><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Get <S%G5217><s%> thee behind <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> Satan: <S%G4567><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> an offense <S%G4625><s%> unto me: <S%G3450><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> thou savorest <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that be of God, <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G235><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> that be of men. <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> If any <S%G1536><s%> man will <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G848><s%> cross, <S%G4716><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G848><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will lose <S%G622><s%> his <S%G848><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for my sake <S%G1752><s%> <S%G1700><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is a man <S%G444><s%> profited, <S%G5623><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he shall gain <S%G2770><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lose <S%G2210><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> soul? <S%G5590><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for his <S%G848><s%> soul? <S%G5590><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> There be <S%G1526><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall not <S%G3361><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> they see <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> kingdom. <S%G932><s%>
